body: This kind of stories make me realize that sometimes you can't always be good person to get the person you love, you need to do everything to get them either it's good or bad, example taking advantage just like what she did. 10/10 kinda wholsesome but good plot tho
If you want story where they take advantage of the person they love, here #373760 #66387
i didn t think i could cleanse my soul after the 228922 incident but oh i was wrong
The Bruh who cheated on Miku, you are dead, not Big suprise
Ahh this is a breath of fresh air for me. A great wholesome females only doujinshi with s t o r y and p l o t. I love me some yuri :)

Este fue el primer doujin +18 que leí... Leerlo de nuevo me hace recordar que conocí vocaloid cuando era 2 años menor que los Kagamine. Recordar lo emocionada que estuve cuando tuve la misma edad que Miku... A pasado mucho tiempo... Que lindos recuerdos.
Y aún pasados todos estos años, sigo shipeando cabron el negitoro.
